attributes.action: Stop all flights into the uk in the coronavirus outbreak
attributes.additional_details: I would like the parliamentary to consider this petition, as if the government would have stop flights from Italy, China and Iran from the start of this outbreak, it would of cut down the number of cases dramatically
attributes.background: in light of the current global situation and what is being asked of the uk public, i am asking the government to stop the arrival of flights from outside the UK, especially Italy, China and iran

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
